duties_responsibilities.duty: Develops strategic plans to manage, develop and grow the business while driving company revenue.

Has overall financial management responsibility to include profit and loss, while positively impacting EBITDA earnings, and manages budgets to ensure compliance with the company and the client customer(s).
Responsible for driving continuous improvement and establishing effective KPIs, monitoring performance, and initiating improvement opportunities.
Oversees multi-plant/site operations, with responsibility for all hiring decisions within the respective assigned vertical line(s) of business.
Serves as the point of contact and acts as the liaison between the company and the client-customer(s).
Promotes a safe working environment and enforces company policies/procedures and corresponding work instructions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Business, Supply Chain, Materials Management and/or Engineering required.
Minimum of 10 years of experience at an operational level related to logistics/supply chain management.
